thread.title: Jane Whiting
thread.title_full: Pimlico Plumbers reviewed by Jane Whiting

author: Jane Whiting
title: Jane Whiting
text: ref DS934973 - I've used Pimlico Plumbers before but a while ago. This past Monday at work water started leaking through the ceiling downstairs and water was flooding from the boiler upstairs, a Monday horror story. Called Pimlico expecting the Quote: to come out urgently to be really expensive, but not only could they get us someone quickly, but at a reasonable rate too. Darren arrived really quickly and calmly worked out the problem. It was a filter on the pipes. we needed a filter change or he could just fuse the pipe. I went for the filter change living in a hard water area and he went and got us a new one. fitted it really quickly and stopped the leak. charge was the agreed hourly rate + like £20/£30 for the filter and VAT. surprisingly reasonable and a great relief. I shall definitely use Pimlico again both at work and for home works.Highly recommend them.
